Distance From Simon Bolivar Airport to Tokyo Haneda International Airport (CCS - HND Distance)

The flight distance from Simon Bolivar Airport (CCS) to Tokyo Haneda International Airport (HND) is 8801 miles. This is equivalent to 14163 kilometers or 7643 nautical miles. The distance shown below is the straight line distance (may be called as flying or air distance) or direct flight distance between airports.


14163 kilometers is the distance from Simon Bolivar Airport, Venezuela to Tokyo Haneda International Airport, Japan.

Flight Duration between Caracas (CCS), Venezuela and Tokyo, Japan

Estimated flight time from Simon Bolivar Airport, Caracas (CCS), Venezuela to Tokyo Haneda International Airport, Tokyo, Japan is 17 hours 36 minutes under avarage conditions. The flight time calculator assumes an average flight speed for a commercial airliner of 500 mph, which is equivalent to 805 km/hr or 434 knots. Your actual flying time may vary depending on wind speeds or weather conditions.

Time Difference Between the Airports • CCS - HND

Time difference between Caracas (CCS) (Venezuela) and Tokyo (Japan) is 13 Hours.
Current local time in Caracas (CCS) is 2025-12-26, 17:30:57 -04 and time in Tokyo is 2025-12-27, 06:30:57 JST.
Tokyo time is 13 Hours ahead of Caracas (CCS).
